modName: Power Door Relay (Allows a 2nd Power Input For Doors)
modShortDescription: Adds a block that can placed under a door to connect a second power input.
modDescription:
Adds a block that can placed under a door to connect a second power input.

## Instructions

* Vault Door and Garage Doors – place the relay directly under the block that your crosshairs are over when you place the [door](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-doors/)
* Hatch – Place the relay in any of the 4 blocks positions that form the opening for the hatch, use only 1 relay per hatch
* Bridges – Place the relay in the center block position directly bellow the hinge
